verse: एवम संप्रसादोऽस्माच्छरीरात्समुत्थाय परं ज्योतिरुपसंपद्य स्वेन रूपेणाभिनिष्पद्यते स उत्तमपुरुषः स तत्र पर्येति जक्षत्क्रीडन्रममाणः स्त्रीभिर्वा यानैर्वा ज्ञातिभिर्वा नोपजन स्मरन्निद शरीर स यथा प्रयोग्य आचरणे युक्त एवमेवायमस्मिञ्छरीरे प्राणो युक्तः॥

terms.स्त्रीभिः: वा यानैः-वा ज्ञातिभिः-वा - with women or vehicles or acquaintances

meaning: Meaning:In this way, by gaining clarity and composure from this body, one rises and connects with the supreme light, manifesting its own form. That transcendent person moves towards it, playing and enjoying, not associated with women, vehicles, or acquaintances, without remembering anything within the body. Just like in practical conduct, the vital breaths are engaged, similarly in this body, the vital breaths are united.
